ingestion_jobs.name: Run Ingestion (Job A)
ingestion_jobs.notes: Iterates enabled sources from backend/ingestion/config/sources.yaml and runs adapters (rss, reddit).

ingestion_jobs.name: Derive Risk (Job B)
ingestion_jobs.notes: Runs clustering, mapping and risk derivation phases.

ingestion_jobs.name: Snapshot Environment
ingestion_jobs.notes: Generates environment snapshots used by UI; typically hourly.

how_to_run_manually.run_single_source_example:
# Python snippet:
from ingestion.core.source_registry import load_sources_yaml
from ingestion.adapters.rss_adapter import RssAdapter
reg = load_sources_yaml('backend/ingestion/config/sources.yaml')
src = reg.get('coindesk_rss')
adp = RssAdapter()
ctx = FetchContext()
items = adp.fetch(ctx, src)
# then normalize/insert or inspect items

notes: RSS and Reddit adapters are implemented and ready. Telegram adapter is a skeleton. The ingestion job is intended to be run by cron every 5 minutes (deployment script includes example cron entries). You can run the ingestion job manually via the Python entrypoint or shell wrapper.
